snippet.title: Orb Tower - Choose your school of magic and reach the top of the tower!
snippet.description:
Play the demo on itch.io https://pierre-vandermaesen.itch.io/orb-tower?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt A Roguelike Bubble Puzzler! Choose your school of magic and reach the top of the tower! Chill pick up and play feel and nostalgic pixel art and music. Get your staff and prepare to shoot orbastical spells!

➡️ More from Pierre Vandermaesen https://pierre-vandermaesen.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More roguelike games https://itch.io/games/tag-roguelike?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
